title: Being Frugal With a "Non-Frugal" Partner
itunes:title: Being Frugal With a "Non-Frugal" Partner

Finding the middle ground when youâ€™re frugal with a non-frugal partner can be quite difficult but a key component of a successful relationship is compromise. In this episode, we discuss tools, questions, and actions you can do with your partner that understands this as more than just a behavior issue but a deeper-rooted one.
